prompts.prompt: Share a personal experience related to friendship and practice using at least 5 sentences.
Summarize the message of a song like "See You Again" in 4–6 sentences for a class discussion.
Write a short diary entry about your day that reflects the feelings in "See You Again".
Create 5 conversation questions you would ask a friend after listening to a song about friendship / memory.
Describe a movie scene that could use a soundtrack like "See You Again" (5–7 sentences).
Write a short pep talk (6–8 sentences) you would give yourself or a friend, inspired by the song.
List 8 key words connected to the theme of Friendship / Memory; make a sentence with each word.
Write a polite message to a friend expressing the main idea of the song and ask 2 follow-up questions.
Rewrite a short news headline as if it carried the mood of "See You Again" (make 5 examples).
Pick one quote or line from a similar public article (not lyrics) about friendship / memory and explain its meaning.
